title: Point-Like States for Type 2b Superstrings
abstract: This paper considers closed-string states of type 2b superstring theory in which the whole string is localized at a single point in superspace. Correlation functions of these (scalar and pseudoscalar) states possess an infinite number of position-space singularities inside and on the light-cone as well as a space-like singularity outside the light-cone.\foot{This paper was previously produced as preprint QMW-91-02.}
